lyrics.stanza: And let them make a sanctuary for Me, That I may dwell in their midst, Our prayer is "Lord, we give ourselves to Thee, We'll be the builders for Your economy."
Under a clear sky, On the mountain, Beholding the glory of the Vision of His building, That He may have His dwelling place, That He may have His dwelling place.
God needs a group of us to turn the age, To fellowship and consecrate, To be in oneness — Yes! This is the way, No pride or boasting, giving Him first place.
Our testimony in the church today, Is the expression of God through man, Let's be the pillars for His dwelling place, But don't be passive — trust in His way.
